Title: This Leadership Structure Is a “4-Headed Monster”
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about:

•       A CFO whose leaders are unclear on his role in the organization

•       A man looking to hire a key employee to help with his $5 million side hustle

•       A young business owner whose employee wants ownership stake in his company

•       A father seeking on advice on how to divide his estate between his children
